summary: This is the official Angular repository on Github, a development platform for building mobile and desktop web applications using TypeScript/JavaScript and other languages. The repository provides detailed documentation, contributing guidelines, and information on the development setup. It also includes various features such as Angular Elements, Server Side Rendering, Schematics, Lazy Loading, and Animations. The repository is actively maintained with regular updates and has a large community of contributors.
